name: Fire Emblem Heroes (FEH) Style/Concept
description:
Open to Requests

A LoRa trained on 4225 images from the mobile game Fire Emblem Heroes.
Works well at 1.0 weight, mixes with other LoRa as well, see sample images.

I would like to give a huge thanks to Lazy on the discord for all their help with DAdaptation and LoRa training in general. Check out their guide: https://civitai.com/models/77908/lora-lazy-dadaptation-guide

The LoRa generally produces art with a style like "full body, standing, black background"

My prompt for the sample images was straight forward:

Prompt:
masterpiece, best quality, <lora:FEH_Concept_v2:1>, black background, simple background, 1girl/1boy, standing, full body, etc...

Negative:
(worst quality, lowres), blurry, bokeh, depth of field, error, text, speech bubble, artist name, signature, border, sketch

I primarily used Hassaku model (NSFW) https://civitai.com/models/2583?modelVersionId=62528, but any NAI-based model should work.

The magical particles can be somewhat controlled, see sample images.
Weapons are very hit or miss.
You can also generate 2 people, 2girls/2boys.


v1.0 had problems so don't ask about it (you can see in the sample images)
